titleStmt.title: Andromeda liberata. Or the nuptials of Perseus and Andromeda. By George Chapman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Laurence L'Isle and are to be sold at his shop in St, Paules-Church-yard, at the signe of the Tigers-head,

notesStmt.note: On the occasion of the marriage of Robert Carr, Earl of Somerset, and Frances Howard Carr, Countess of Somerset.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules-Church-yard, at the signe of the Tigers-head
